mapper.select: SELECT w.id,w.wechat_id,w.biz_name,wi.fans,w.head,wi.first_avg_read weekReadMean, wi.first_avg_read*7 weekReadCount,wi.article_count weekPushCount FROM wechat w LEFT JOIN wechat_info wi ON w.wechat_id=wi.wechat_id and w.biz_name is not null GROUP BY w.wechat_id ORDER BY wi.fans desc,weekReadMean DESC,weekReadCount desc,weekPushCount desc limit #{start},#{length}

SELECT w.id,w.wechat_id,w.qr_code,w.biz_name,w.head,w.biz_desc,wi.fans,wi.first_avg_read, wi.second_avg_read,wi.third_more_avg_read,wi.article_count weekPushCount FROM wechat w LEFT JOIN wechat_info wi ON w.wechat_id=wi.wechat_id where w.id=#{id}
